text: Sosyan () or Susiyan is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located in the Aqil mountains, some northeast of the city of Aleppo and northwest of al-Bab, it is administratively part of Nahiya al-Bab of al-Bab District. Nearby localities include Hezwan to the southwest and Qubbet Elsheikh to the northeast. In the 2004 census, Sosyan had a population of 1,452. ==References==
title: Sosyan
